author: gawor
msg: increase timeout for publish lock to 2 mins

author: hwright
msg: Update a couple of scripts on the Ubuntu buildslave.  This makes use of the
generic /dev/shm ramdisk, rather than creating a special one for the bot.
Don't mount a special ramdisk, just use a symlink to /dev/shm.
